resources.string: I am a student in my third year of Applied Computer Science at Wrocław University of Science and Technology. I am also a scout leader at 23th Wrocławska Drużyna Harcerska "Wilki".
I\'m a big fan of dogs. Although \nI don\'t have one at the moment, \nI aspire to have a Shetland Sheepdog in the future.
My personal motto is,\n\'Another day, another slay.\'
This is classified as severely underweight. It means that the body weight is significantly below what is recommended for one\'s height, which may lead to health issues.

This is classified as underweight. It means that the body weight is below what is recommended for one\'s height. Individuals in this range might experience a lack of energy or health problems related to malnutrition.
This is classified as mildly underweight. The body weight is slightly below the norm, but the risk of health issues is lesser than that of being severely underweight.
This is classified as normal weight. Individuals with a BMI in this range generally have the lowest risk of health problems related to their body weight.
This is classified as overweight. Having a body weight above the recommended range may increase the risk of various health issues.
This is classified as Obese Class I. Individuals in this BMI range face an elevated risk of health problems associated with excessive body weight.
This is classified as Obese Class II. This condition poses an even higher risk of health issues than Class I obesity.
This is classified as Obese Class III, also known as extreme obesity. Individuals with such a BMI have a very high risk of severe health problems related to excessive body weight.
Invalid BMI category which doesn\'t fit into any of the above classifications.
You have to calculate your bmi first
Please enter valid height and weight values.
